resources.string: There was a connection error. Try once or twice again, it usually works at the first or second attempt.
There is no data connection available.
A data connection is needed for the application to work.
No text can be translated without data connection.
You can always change this option through the menu
Mmm... something strange happened, sorry. Please try again...
To conjugate the verb you need to install the application ConxuGalego. Do you want to download it?
To search in the dictionary you need to install the application DicionarioGalego. Do you want to download it?
The term \'%1$s\' does not look like a verb.
Version 1.0 - Thank you for downloading it!
Version 1.0.1 - Now the interface is also in Catalan! Thank you Millán González (millangz@gmail.com)
Version 1.0.2\n- Fixed problem with integration images\n- Some bugs fixed
Version 1.0.3 - Fixed a bug in translation page
The term \'%1$s\' was not found in the dictionary
This application obtains all the translations from the translator available at http://www.xunta.es/tradutor/
Whatever your profile is, you can always select the direction of the translation (original language and the language of the translated text).
Use the middle button (arrows) to select the language you want to change: the original or the final. Keep in mind that one of them must be the Galician language.
Type the text you want to translate in the input text box (up to 2500 characters) and press
You can also dictate the text you want to translate, pressing
We use profiles to facilitate the use of the translator.
If you are from Galicia, the interface will be in Galician, and this will be the input language by default.
If you are not from Galicia, the interface will be in your device\'s language, and texts will be translated to Galician by default.
You can always change your profile from the menu pressing the following icon
In the translations screen you can see the translated text
Red color indicates that there is no available translation for the selected words.
